raw_body: EDWARD – JOSEPH CHRISTOPHER RAJASINGHAM (JOE) – (Former Regional Manager – Sri Lanka Insurance Corporation,​ Senior Manager – Whittall Boustead (Union Assurance Limited),​ Head of Insurance at John Keells Holdings and Bartlett and Past President – Rotay Colombo Uptown),​ dearly beloved husband of Indra (nee Saverimuttu),​ loving father of Tanuj (Orient Insurance) and late Niluj,​ father-in-law of Manjula (nee Bastians) and Krishanthi (nee Anthony),​ much loved grandfather of Ashwini (IFS),​ Shania,​ Andrew and Anika,​ brother of Ranjan,​ late Nesam and Christabel,​ brother-in-law of late Joseph Chrisostom,​ Reggie Emmanuel,​ Inbam and of Leela,​ Ranji,​ Dunstan,​ Ravi Saverimuttu,​ the late Austin Tisseverasinghe and of Charles Rajanathan,​ Dr Sahayani and Mala,​ was called to Rest in the Arms of Jesus on the 19th of October 2023. Cortege leaves A.F. Raymond’s Funeral Parlour at 2.30 p.m. on the 20th of October for Funeral Service at St. Mary’s Church,​ Nayakakanda followed by Burial at the General Cemetery,​ Nayakakanda,​ Hendala,​ Wattala.067283
